name: Unity-chan vs Pronama-chan
description:
It was designed to be an easy-to-play fighting game like Rising Thunder, Granblue Fantasy VS without technical input.

It's a game I've been working on for five years.

I've been working on it for five years now, but I can't seem to finish it, and I can't seem to sell it, so I'm releasing it here.

I'd be happy if you could give it a try.

  • No Solo game mode yet
  • No Online Match yet
